item.title: Hotel-X: Booking flow
item.description:
Search, Quote and Book transactions must be executed sequentally in order to book hotel rooms in a Seller. -- 1. SEARCH 2. QUOTE 3.
[...]

item.title: Hotel-X: Quickstart
item.description:

item.title: Hotel-X: Search
item.description:
Search is the first operation in the booking flow. It allows to check which available rooms there are for the requested hotels or for the hotels in the requested destination for a given range of dates and for a given pax distribution. Advanced criteria It explains different parameters that can be set up in the request Mandatory CheckIn: check-in date for the booking. Format: YYYY-MM-DD CheckOut: check-out date for the booking.
[...]

item.title: Hotel-X: Quote
item.description:
Quote is an operation used to assess and valuate the rate before the actual booking. It returns the same information as the Search response for a hotel rate with up-to-date price, along with additional information regarding the rate: rate breakdown and cancellation policies. Advanced criteria It explains different parameters that can be set up in the request (it indicates which ones are mandatory) optionRefId: Identifier of the option chosen in Search.
[...]

item.title: Hotel-X: Book
